content:
Sure, here's a revised description without mentioning Galaxolide:

"Accord Royale is a luxurious and enchanting perfume that opens with the sparkling freshness of citrus and bergamot top notes. The heart of the fragrance blooms with the delicate floral notes of lily of the valley and jasmine, complemented by a warm and velvety base of cashmeran, musk, and vanilla. This sophisticated scent is perfect for those who seek a touch of elegance and refinement in their daily lives."
